anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch69735 [Haneru] is a middle school student who loves dance to the point he can hear rhythm in the sound of chalk during class. One day after school, in the secret spot where he practices dancing, he meets http://anidb.net/ch69734 [Kanon], who`s there to practice as well. They have a great time dancing together, and eventually face off against rivals in dance battles as they grow up. Source: ANN

tag.name: dancing
tag.description: Dance is when people move their body to music. There are many kinds of dance, like ballet or waltz. Dancing can be done for fun but can be also an art.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: performance
tag.description: The song performance on stage or acting in a theatre is a central part of the character`s life in this anime type.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: the arts
tag.description: The arts represent an outlet of human expression, usually influenced by culture, and driven by human creative impulse. Major constituents of the arts include literature – including poetry, novels and short stories, and epics; performing arts – among them music, dance, and theatre; culinary arts such as baking, chocolatiering, and winemaking; media arts like photography and film, and visual arts – including drawing, painting, and sculpting. Some art forms combine a visual element with performance (e.g. film) and the written word (e.g. comics). From prehistoric cave paintings to modern day films, art serves as a vessel for storytelling and conveying mankind`s relationship with its environment. Source: Wiki

episode.title: 運命のムーブ! 二人の出会い
The Moves of Fate! The Two Meet!
Unmei no Move! Futari no Deai
episode.summary: Tobitatsu Haneru took up dancing inspired by Jey, the superstar. Although short in stature, he more than makes up for it with his big moves and jumps. On this day, he heads to his usual practice grounds by parkouring his way across town. He begins practicing as soon as he gets there by looking at his reflection on the glass windows. Little did he know that he was being watched from the other side by a girl who`d also come to practice dancing, Otosaki Kanon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特訓! 右にゃんこ!?
Training! Right Cat?!
Tokkun! Migi Nyanko!?
episode.summary: Haneru and Kanon had finally teamed up, but Kanon was worried that their moves weren`t cool enough. When she practices isolation—the basic art of moving only certain parts of your body—during her dance lessons at school, she convinces Haneru to make it a part of their training. Haneru, however, isn`t too good at the basics and struggles with it. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 挑戦! ダンスバトル!!
Challenge! Dance Battle!
Chousen! Dance Battle!!
episode.summary: The dance battle with Tribal Soul begins! Charged up for his first ever battle, Haneru displays his energetic and pulsating moves. Kanon, who was panicking at first, gradually grows mesmerized by Tribal Soul`s dancing and starts focusing on her own moves. She even gets a read on the rhythm and tries to imitate her opponents by getting in sync with the music. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トライバルソウル オン ステージ!!
Tribal Soul! On Stage!
Tribal Soul On Stage!!
episode.summary: Haneru asks Kanon to team up with him, only for her to run away from him. Refusing to give up, he visits the practice spot every day, but doesn`t get to meet her. It was then that he finds out about street dancing events being held at Green Square and goes there in hopes of running into Kanon. Meanwhile, the mysterious Master T shows up in front of Kanon and tells her to go watch the event. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いざダンスロードへ! センターは誰!?
Dance Road, Here We Come! Who`ll Be the Center?!
Iza Dance Road e! Center wa Dare!?
episode.summary: Having been invited to participate in Dance Road, Haneru`s full of motivation. The members of Tribe Cool Crew decides to use a new song, and begin creating a routine for it. When it turns out that they don`t have a confirmed center, Haneru volunteers for the role. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トラクル始動! ハネルVSクモ!?
Tribe Cool Crew Moves Out! Haneru vs. Kumo?!
Torakuru Shidou! Haneru vs Kumo!?
episode.summary: As the first day of practice since forming the new team comes about, Haneru and Kanon head to Tribal Soul`s usual spot with renewed enthusiasm. They all meet up and formally introduce themselves, but Haneru`s desire to dance freely conflicts with Kumo`s instructions to warm up properly, causing immediate discord between the two. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆襲! ダンスバトル!!
Counterattack! Dance Battle!
Gyakushuu! Dance Battle!!
episode.summary: The day of the rematch with Tribal Soul finally arrives. Surprisingly, that ends up being the very first match up of the tournament. Haneru and Kanon get fired up and head into the dance battle. The isolation practice pays dividends as the two show off their sharp moves and get in sync with the music, finishing their routine off with Haneru`s explosive jumps! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ムーブMAX!二人の魅力!?
Maximum Moves! The Two`s Appeal?!
Move Max! Futari no Miryoku!?
episode.summary: Unable to practice at their usual spot, Haneru and Kanon get dragged off by Mizuki to Tribal Soul`s hangout. But there, Kumo tells them not to make light of dancing. Haneru shows off his newly-acquired isolation skills and his special jumps, but he can`t get Kumo to bat an eyelid. Things get gloomy as Haneru and Kanon are at a loss as to how to improve before the tournament. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 届け! クリスマスダンス!
Touch Them! Christmas Dance!
Todoke! Christmas Dance!
episode.summary: Tribe Cool Crew decide to throw a party on Christmas Eve, but not only does Kumo refuse to participate, he also takes the day off from practice. Finding this strange, the rest of them decide to to figure out where he`s going. They tail him on the day only to reach a nursery school, where they find out that Kumo was helping out the teachers there after a chance meeting. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光速! 爆音マシンガンズ!!
Life in the Fast Lane! Explosive Machine Guns!
Kousoku! Bakuon Machine Guns!!
episode.summary: Yuji`s three-man team, the Explosive Machine Guns, take the stage to perform after Tribe Cool Crew. Their lightning moves are so exhilarating that the audience can`t take their eyes off them. Haneru and Kanon were no exceptions, as they were utterly entranced by their steps. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 行くぜ! ダンスロード!!
Let`s Go! Dance Road!
Ikuze! Dance Road!!
episode.summary: The day of the Dance Road auditions is finally arrives. The map in their invite leads the members of Tribe Cool Crew to a Sunday morning business district, but they find nobody there. Suddenly, the Jey logo on the invite starts glowing to show them the way. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怪奇天狗伝説 ユヅルが消えた!
Close Encounters of the Tengu Kind! Yuzuru Disappeared!
Kaiki Tengu Densetsu: Yuzuru ga Kieta!
episode.summary: Someone`s been watching Tri-Cool and they know it. When Haneru decides to chase after them to find out who it is, they show their agility and reflexes as they try to make their escape. Haneru finally catches them, though, only to find out that it`s a girl named Momiji. She`s a descendent of the tengu, and more shockingly for Haneru and gang, claims to be Yuzuru`s fiancée. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魅せてステップ! カノンの学園祭
Bewitching Steps! Kanon`s School Festival!
Hakasete Step! Kanon no Gakuensai
episode.summary: A dance contest will be held at Kanon`s school festival. Ayumu enters her into the contest without telling her, which makes her panic. She later tries to go get her entry withdrawn, but that`s when her homeroom teacher finds out about her street dancing activities. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジェイ・エル来日!
Jey El in Japan!
Jey El Rainichi!
episode.summary: At long last, Jey El`s world tour makes its way to Japan, and Haneru can hardly wait for the concert. With their tickets in hand, every member of Tribe Cool Crew is excited for the day to come. At the same time, Master T catches wind of some very ominous news: that someone hired a sniper to take Jey out. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誕生!? トライバルソウル
Genesis?! Tribal Soul!
Tanjou!? Tribal Soul
episode.summary: Haneru and Kanon follow Mizuki to a construction site, where she and Kumo once used to practice. She wanted to take one last look at the place since she heard it was getting torn down. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特訓! ハンドスプリング
Crash Course! Handspring!
Tokkun! Hand Spring
episode.summary: During practice one day, Kanon`s told to try coming up with a special move that makes use of her strengths. As usual, she starts overthinking it, forcing Ayumu to tell her off. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カノンの一番長い日
The Longest Day of Kanon`s Life
Kanon no Ichiban Nagai Hi
episode.summary: A stranger calls out to Kanon on her way back from school. Turns out he`s the president of a talent agency, and that he looked into popular Internet sensation Rhythm to find out that it was Kanon behind the mask. Now, he wants to recruit her to his agency. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 出来た? ギャラクシーウォーク
It`s Complete? Galaxy Walk!
Dekita? Galaxy Walk
episode.summary: While Tribe Cool Crew makes plans for the upcoming Dance Road, Haneru suddenly pulls off an incredible move that startles everyone. He calls it an evolved moonwalk, a galaxy walk. But when he tries to repeat it, he can`t. Haneru had no idea how he`d pulled it off the first time. Thus, he practices the move, and even gets Kanon to help him out, but nothing seems to work. That`s when Mr. Wakui visits them, who`d remembered his younger days, when he`d frequently fever at the disco. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二人がケンカ!? 始まりはイカ!
The Two Fight?! It All Started over Squid!
Futari ga Kenka!? Hajimari wa Ika!
episode.summary: Haneru and Kanon end up fighting over which of "Squid`s Whistle" and "Squirt Serenade," their preferred snacks respectively, is better. It`s a trivial argument, but having let the chance to apologize slip by, the two find it hard to make up. And after hearing about it, Mizuki and Yuzuru get into the same argument and, instead of smoothing things over between the two, only make things worse. What`s more, Yuji appears in front of Haneru and Kanon, and turns it into the worst-case scenario. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦えトラクル! 衝撃のダンスロード!!
Fight, Tri-Cool! The Impactful Dance Road!
Tatakae Torakuru! Shougeki no Dance Road!!
episode.summary: With the theme for the second round of Dance Road being "fighting," the members of Tribe Cool Crew agree with Haneru`s suggestion that it refers not to dance battles, but having the courage to stand up to anything. They practice hard to express that with their dancing until the day of the second round comes around. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 踊るマスターT!
Master T Dances!
Odoru Master T!
episode.summary: After getting through the first two trials in the third round of Dance Road, Tribe Cool Crew find Master T waiting for them in the final trial. They have to watch Master T`s dance, memorize it in one go, and reproduce it perfectly. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 霧のダンスロードタワー
The Foggy Dance Road Tower!
Kiri no Dance Road Tower
episode.summary: It`s finally time for the third round of Dance Road. Kanon pumps herself up for it and even debuts a new outfit. When Tribe Cool Crew follow the Jey symbols again, they reach a massive tower covered by fog—the venue for this round. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルイ&モエ
Lui & Moe
Lui & Moe
episode.summary: The Dance Road road trip brings Tribe Cool Crew to Lake Suwa. Immediately, Haneru asks Kanon to go explore the area with him, which is when they ruin to the dancer pair of Lui and Moe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怪奇!? 漬け物館
Close Encounters of the Pickle Mansion Kind?!
Kaiki!? Tsukemono-kan
episode.summary: Tribe Cool Crew has to take a road trip to the location of the next round of Dance Road, so they get in a car and head for Lake Suwa. They`re in high spirits when they leave, but heavy rain along the way forces them to take shelter in an inn together along with Master T, who`d come to pick them up. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! ハネルとヒロト
Clash! Haneru and Hiroto!
Gekitotsu! Haneru to Hiroto
episode.summary: Hiroto, Haneru`s classmate, is always at his throat, and even ends up angering him when he says he doesn`t want to watch him dance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ムーブ満開! 花よりダンスだぜ!
Maximum Bloom! Dance over Flowers!
Move Mankai! Hana yori Dance Da ze!
episode.summary: At Yuzuru`s suggestion, Tribe Cool Crew decides to hold a cherry blossom viewing party. Yuzuru attaches great importance to this event each year, and this year is no different, as he plans to once again prepare the ultimate culinary experience, the "Cherry Viewing Hundred-Layer Lunch." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルイモエ再び!
LuiMoe Returns!
Rui Moe Futatabi!
episode.summary: When Haneru and gang head to Green Square, they run into some unexpected dancers: Lui and Moe, whom they`d met during the third round of Dance Road. But their dance is different now, and the audience cheers wildly for them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: くるりと変身! ユヅル真の姿?
A Drastic Transformation! Yuzuru`s True Form?
Kururi to Henshin! Yuzuru Shin no Sugata
episode.summary: Kanon and her sister, Kimika, arrive at a tea salon, where they run into Yuzuru enjoying his cup of tea. Both him and Kimika have come looking for the legendary tea that the cafe`s owner, Ms. Otsuru, prepares: the Miracle Diamond. However, a pair of robbers show up out of nowhere, making those inside the cafe panic. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鬼姫とトライブツルツル
The Demon Princess and Tribe Chrome Dome
Oni Hime to Tribe Tsurutsuru
episode.summary: Mizuki has been looking awfully tired of late, so much so that she even falls asleep while doing her stretches. She`s been busy because a friend had asked her to train a group of beginner dancers with an average age in the seventies. While juggling that, her usual job, and practice with Tri-cool, she also gets inundated with requests for advice from her friend, wiping her out completely. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ケンダマの誓い!
The Cup and Ball Guy`s Vow!
Kendama no Chikai!
episode.summary: One day, Haneru meets a grade schooler named Satoshi. He`s the younger brother of Yuji, Haneru`s rival in dance. This surprises Haneru, because it just happened so that the two of them were about to face off in a dance battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トライバルソウル対クールクルー
Tribal Soul vs. Cool Crew
Tribal Soul Tai Cool Crew
episode.summary: By speaking to her mother and Team Sakura, Kanon thinks about how to face her team, after which she begins practicing with Haneru again. Meanwhile, Kumo, Mizuki, and Yuzuru watch Tri-Cool`s videos, research Kanon`s moves, and begin to practice too. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カノンに何が起こったか?
What in the World Happened to Kanon?
Kanon ni Nani ga Okottaka?
episode.summary: One day, Kanon has a strange dream. All of the Tri-Cool members except her get blown away by her own moves, and for some reason, that makes Kanon anxious. She goes to practice with Tri-Cool as usual, but she`s somewhat out of step with the rest of them. The more she tries to get things back on track, the worse it gets. She feels strange after that, too, while dancing at Green Square or at school. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: モミジ・リターンズ! 炎の指ぱっちん
Momiji Returns! The Fiery Finger Click
Momiji Returns! Honoo no Yubi Pacchin
episode.summary: The girl tengu, Momiji, shows up again and suddenly declares her intent to become a dancer, surprising the members of Tri-Cool. Kumo, however, decides to help her and assigns Haneru the job of her dance instructor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アユムのラブラブ大作戦
Ayumu`s Operation Lovey-Dovey
Ayumu no Love Love Daisakusen
episode.summary: Ayumu starts to think Kanon likes Haneru, and heads to Tri-Cool`s practice spot to observe the two of them. After jumping to the conclusion that the two of them have yet to realize their true feelings, she decides to give them a push. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 求められる変化! ダンスロードを乗り越えろ!
The Change Demanded of Us! Overcome Dance Road!
Motomerareru Henka! Dance Road o Norikoeru!
episode.summary: It`s finally time for the fourth round of Dance Road! Team Sakura and the Explos1ve Machine Guns are at the venue, too. In this round, only two of the teams can progress to the next round. After receiving a message from Jey himself and getting all fired up, everyone took on the challenge of Dance Road and the fourth round`s theme, "change." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖のクモ屋敷!
The Terrifying Kumo Mansion!
Kyoufu no Kumo Yashiki!
episode.summary: With the next round of Dance Road almost upon them, Tri-Cool focus on practice, but that`s when Kumo goes and gets himself hurt. The injury is diagnosed as needing one whole month to heal, meaning Kumo can`t participate in Dance Road. Haneru and gang promise to Kumo that they`ll definitely make it through the next round together, but they can`t figure out a way to cover for his absence. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 揺れるトラクル!? 禁断のムーブメント
Tri-Cool Wavers?! The Forbidden Movement
Yureru Torakuru!? Kindan no Movement
episode.summary: Team Sakura and the Explos1ve Machine Guns looking for new challenges gives Tribe Cool Crew a rather rude awakening. Meanwhile, the forbidden taboo, Crowd High, begins to gain massive popularity around the world. Unable to take this lying down, Haneru pleads with the rest of the group to get more pumped up. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の選択! 双子かコロッケ!?
The Fateful Decision! Twins or Croquettes?!
Unmei no Sentaku! Futago ka Croquette!?
episode.summary: Hinata and Manabi of Team Sakura had been invited to have a practice session together by Yuji. Wanting a new challenge, they suggest to the Explos1ve Machine Guns that they should dance together, but once they do, they find out that they`re not a very good fit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハッピー! お買い物大作戦!?
Happy! Operation Shopping?!
Happy! Okaimono Daisakusen!?
episode.summary: Kanon heads to the shopping mall to buy a birthday present for her mom, where she and Ayumu run into Team Sakura. They get dragged into a performance contest, where the living embodiment of evil, Kumodeon, proves to be the X-factor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キラキラクルクル
Shiny Cool Crew
Kirakira Cool Crew
episode.summary: To celebrate Kumo`s recovery from his foot injury, Tri-Cool decide to go on a training camp to the beach. There they hear about a dance that makes the ocean shine. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハネルとジェイ
Haneru and Jey
Haneru to Jey
episode.summary: According to Lui and Moe, the emotion poured into Crowd High`s moves is rage—the desire to dye the world in one`s own colors. When Haneru gives it a shot, he`s overcome by a sensation of becoming bigger and stronger than before. It really amps him up and makes his body perform the moves naturally. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハネル対クラウド・ハイ
Haneru vs. Crowd High
Haneru tai Crowd High
episode.summary: Crowd High`s become a massive movement. So much so that Lui & Moe make television appearances, and everyone at Haneru`s school practices it during breaks. Haneru takes in this sight with complicated feelings. The fact that his beloved Jey had never touched Crowd High preys on his mind. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦! クラウド・ハイ
Decisive Battle! Crowd High
Kessen! Crowd High
episode.summary: Haneru and gang are startled by Gallagher`s sudden proclomation that Crowd High will take over Dance Road, and Mabel ends up getting captured. What`s more, the trendsetters of Crowd High challenged the Dance Road finalists to dance battles! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ついに来た! ジェイの島
We`re Finally Here! Jey`s Island!
Tsui ni Kita! Jey no Shima
episode.summary: Haneru and gang have to visit Jey`s territory, Bright Island, for the final round of Dance Road, so they head there along with Blossom Bullets on Hinata and Manabi`s private jet. The girl tengu, Momiji, also ends up tagging along. And once they get there, Mabel finally tells them why Dance Road has to be kept secret. Just what is this shocking revelation? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハネルと父ちゃん 波乱の夏祭り!
Haneru and Dad`s Stormy Summer Festival!
Haneru to Tou-chan: Haran no Natsumatsuri!
episode.summary: With it being summer festival season, Haneru`s dad is all fired up about manning the drums during the Bunchaka Festival. But Haneru doesn`t want to help this year because he wants to focus on dance. This sets off a huge argument between the two, making the mood in the Tobitatsu home stormy in the middle of summer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: みんな終わった? 自由研究
Everyone Finished? Free Research
Minna Owatta? Jiyuukenkyuu
episode.summary: Haneru`s summer homework isn`t getting anywhere. Koji proposes that the three of them work on a research project together. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界が変わる! ダンスで変わる!
Dance Will Change the World!
Sekai ga Kawaru! Dance de Kawaru!
episode.summary: After Tri-Cool`s moves of spirit awaken Jey from his coma, the stage is set for the final battle between Gallagher and Tribe Cool Crew. However, some others unexpectedly join in. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジェイ対トライブクルクル
Jey vs. Tribe Cool Crew
Jey tai Tribe Cool Crew
episode.summary: Haneru and the rest of Tri-Cool celebrate after defeating Gold and Silver, but end up having to face Gallagher and the Dance Roid. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魂のムーブ!
The Moves of Spirit!
Tamashii no Move!
episode.summary: Blossom Bullets and Tribe Cool Crew show Gold, Silver, and Gallagher that they`ve inherited Jey`s moves of spirit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決起! ブロッサムバレッツ
Take a Stand! Blossom Bullets
Kekki! Blossom Barets
episode.summary: The Crowd High duo of Gold and Silver blow the roof off the place and declare themselves the best dancers in the world. Yuji takes exception to this and, along with the rest of Blossom Bullets, decides to challenge them head-on. Source: crunchyroll
